title: The Bilgewater theme doesn't play
body: I love the Bilgewater theme since it gives variation to the music I listen to while playing. Recently though it seems to play an earlier version of the default theme, or maybe just the same one. Was it removed or is this a bug?

replies.body:
Hiya RobobertSmitty,

This is currently working as intended. With the end of Burning Tides, we removed the Bilgewater music. However, the UI for the music option will not be removed until next patch.

Is there any way you guys can keep the theme? This would mean the next time you guys make more themes that they will be used for longer than just an event, same thing with the Gangplank announcer.
PS thanks for the reply
OH COME ON! Please keep the option for the Bilgewater theme, it makes playing as GP so much more epic.

can u help me? im server eu nordic east, i cant connect into a game after champion select, it said  unable to connect to server please check your network connection and attempt to reconnect to your game, i try so many ways to fix it, nothing...ty
